mapper.update: UPDATE SYS_KNOWLEDGE_PERMISSION SET id=#{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, TYPEID=#{typeId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PERMISSIONTYPE=#{permissionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNERID=#{ownerId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, OWNER=#{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERMISSIONJSON=#{permissionJson,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT per.ID,per.TYPEID,per.PERMISSIONTYPE,per.OWNERID,per.OWNER,per.PERMISSIONJSON,gl.typeName FROM SYS_KNOWLEDGE_PERMISSION per,SYS_GL_TYPE gl WHERE per.TYPEID = gl.TYPEID and id=#{id}

select per.ID,per.TYPEID,per.PERMISSIONTYPE,per.OWNERID,per.OWNER,per.PERMISSIONJSON,per.refId,gl.typeName FROM SYS_KNOWLEDGE_PERMISSION per,SYS_GL_TYPE gl WHERE per.TYPEID = gl.TYPEID and per.REFID = #{refId} UNION select p.ID,p.TYPEID,p.PERMISSIONTYPE,p.OWNERID,p.OWNER,p.PERMISSIONJSON,p.refId,g.typeName from SYS_KNOWLEDGE_PERMISSION p ,sys_type_key g where p.TYPEID = g.TYPEID and p.refId = #{refId}
